name: Rodrigo Queiroz
about: Experienced, self-taught Web and Mobile Developer, expert in all phases of development. Knowledgeable in user interface, testing, and debugging processes. Bringing experience in designing, installing, testing, and maintaining web systems. Equipped with a diverse and promising skill set. Proficient in a range of technologies, including HTML, CSS, Javascript, Typescript, React, React Native, Jest, and React Testing Library. Able to effectively self-manage independent projects, as well as collaborate in a team environment.
headline: Frontend Developer React, React Native, Javascript, Typescript
